summary: A cowboy detective goes up against a gang of big-city thugs trying to set up a protection racket out west.
cast: Rex Bell|Marceline Day|Matthew Betz|Huntley Gordon|Roy D'Arcy|Robert Ellis|Gwen Lee|Harry Semels|Al Bridge|Rae Daggett|John Elliott|Gordon De Main|George 'Gabby' Hayes|Earl Dwire|Ernie Adams|Silver Tip Baker|Barney Beasley|Hank Bell|Bob Burns|Fred Burns|Rube Dalroy|Dick Dickinson|Sheik the Horse|Si Jenks|Theodore Lorch|Jack Low|Perry Murdock|Skeets Noyes|Tex Palmer|Blackjack Ward
keywords: cheyenne wyoming|police detective|held at gunpoint|deception|city in title
director: Director: Harry L. Fraser (as Harry Fraser)
title: Broadway to Cheyenne
